mapper.update: update xhgmnet_bs_checkcut as a set a.bsId=#{bsId},a.name=#{name},a.hometype=#{hometype},a.transfer=#{transfer}, a.transferCompare=#{transferCompare},a.transferOne=#{transferOne}, a.transferTwo=#{transferTwo},a.powerOne=#{powerOne},a.powerTimeOne=#{powerTimeOne},a.powerTwo=#{powerTwo}, a.powerTimeTwo=#{powerTimeTwo},a.maintainTime=#{maintainTime},a.isPower=#{isPower},a.firstDesc=#{firstDesc}, a.desc=#{desc},a.breakTime=#{breakTime},a.restoreTime=#{restoreTime},a.checkCutTime=#{checkCutTime}, a.alarmTime=#{alarmTime},a.situation=#{situation},a.rules=#{rules},a.period=#{period}, a.applyTime=#{applyTime},a.persion1=#{persion1},a.persion2=#{persion2},a.suggest=#{suggest},a.persion3=#{persion3} where a.id=#{id}
